data.title: Superb Sandwiches
data.text: Stuffed Sandwiches Fresh Food Fairly Priced. There may be lines but they move very quickly. I've had a variety of sandwiches and they have all been delicious. A large sandwich can easily feed two people.

data.title: Quick lunch break while traveling
data.text: I'm from South Florida.  One of the things we miss most is a good ole Laspadas sub!  Every time we travel back to South Florida, we stop and once again before going back home!  The freshest bread and meats around.  I love the smell every time we walk thru their doors.  You will never go wrong when you stop!  Just make sure you bring your appetite!  The subs are huge and filling.  Several locations in Palm Bch County and Broward County.

data.title: Super Sandwiches For Super Bowl Weekend
data.text: The line was long but with a dozen workers behind the counter taking and preparing your order things moved surprisingly fast. A mini chain operation originating in Westchester, PA, this operation in Boca Raton near the Towne Center Mall is a welcome addition to the neighborhood. For those of us that like to take a night off from cooking once in a while Laspada's is a nice alternative. The fresh meats, cheeses, accompliments and dressings on freshly baked rolls makes for great sandwich eating. The rolls are an overstuffed, mouthwatering dining pleasure while watching the Super Bowl or any other time. Treat yourself to a traditional "Yankee" delicacy in the warmth of Florida sunshine B

data.title: Fresh Food, Needlessly Slow Service
data.text: The hoagies are better than most in the area; the food is fresh, and the portions are generous.  However, part of the reason they seem to be "swamped" every day is because a good portion of the the staff meanders at times. For example, my order of two sandwiches (straightforward order - two "Monsters" with everything, on white) took over 15 minutes to finish because the woman putting the subs together would stop and just stare off every few minutes, then turned to sneeze and chit chat, then went back to working on the food, taking her absolute time layering on one piece of cheese, get distracted again, layer on another, etc...  A little consistency in service timeliness would go a long way. This is the third time this has happened to me recently - each time with a different person, which makes me think it's a hiring or training issue, or perhaps the people they have there now simply don't care about operating with a sense of urgency.  I will not go back for a while; hopefully they will work this out.

data.title: I love these men!! And their subs!
data.text: So we work like 2 cities away from this location in Boca but we do not mind driving for their great food! Their subs are so fresh! Perfectly made with fresh veggies that are still crunchy with every bite! Their tuna ROCKS!!!! (My favorite!) Their bread is soft to perfection!! All the toppings you can choose are great........to top it ooofff..... voodoo chips! If you don't know what that is, please try them. They are the perfect ratio of vinegar and bbq taste. You have to try them!!!

data.title: Great subs
data.text:
very very good subs good price a great place to have a fast meal on a bread.
good choices, fresh ingredients, good al around!

data.title: Lunch Trip
data.text: Sandwich was ok. Normally I go to the one on Sample Rd, and it just didn't seem to live up to the other. Laspadas is amazing, though, so maybe just one bad sandwich.

data.title: By far the best hoagies in and around Boca
data.text: Most sandwich places suck in S Florida, but LaSpadas is da bomb!!!  The ONLY place to get a real hoagie around here!

data.title: Good food, but service was a bit rude
data.text:
Pros:
- I mean, let's put it out there, you get a lot of food for the money here.  If what you're looking for is a good, big sandwich, this place delivers just that.

Cons:
- From what I could tell, no hot subs.
- I've had a better Italian Hoagie at plenty of places.
- Of the 5-6 guys on the line, most were pleasant.  One guy was flat out rude.  When they switched the bread around and my colleague who at with me said "I think you made a mistake, mine is supposed to be on wheat" and I attest, without her voice raised, the guy muttered aloud "Geez, it's just a sub lady, no need to get all stressed out".  That's the difference between a 4 star and a 3 star rating in my book.
- Kind of a cramped space.  Not a great spot to go if you're looking for space to have a nice business lunch.

data.title: Best Hoagie you will ever have!
data.text: If you want the mac daddy of hoagies, this is the place.  Many have tried to copy Laspada's, but no go.  There is only 1 Laspadas.  Be careful if you go large, because its so good, you will eat it all and be stuffed later.  Absolutely the best hoagie you will ever eat.

data.title: OUR FAVORITE LUNCH SPOT!!
data.text: This place is AWESOME!!!! They cut the meat in front of you and toss it to the person who is making your sandwich. You won't find a better sandwich anywhere! The staff is outstanding. They're super fast and always have a smile on their faces.

data.title: Best Subs in South Florida
data.text: Hands down the best subs for the money. And it's not just the quality of the meats and the breads, it's the staff. Specially in the Boca Raton site. They are just awesome. Do not be surprised to see a line out the door when you stop by, but no worries because they are fast at making the subs.  I understand one can find a sub shop pretty much anywhere but guaranteed this place has them beat by far.

data.title: My Favorite Local Sub Shop!
data.text: I first started going to Laspada's over 15 years ago down in Ft. Lauderdale. When they opened the Boca location I couldn't have been happier. I try to go here as much as I can when I am in town. Everything is amazing about this place. Family run, quick, and super tasty. I always get the Italian. The bread is fresh, they cut the meats to order and have lots of tasty toppings. The sweet peppers just make the sandwich. I've introduced many people to this sub shop and they agree, it is the best!! I will continue to go back over and over again!

data.title: Still the Best
data.text:
I have been going to LaSpada's since they opened in Lauderdale by the Sea in the 70's.

They still serve the best hoagies in South Florida. It is truly a production line.

I had my favorite the Italian and my wife ordered the turkey and roast beef.

data.title: Best subs in town!
data.text: Consistently the best subs in the area! can be a line to get your food so might want to call it in first!

data.title: Best subs in the area
data.text: Love this place.... my son brings all of his college friends from up north here.   If you are bringing guests from out of town to a sub shop- it has to be good :)

data.title: Have gone here since they opened- Best sub by far in 20 mile radius
data.text: This place is magic and we also went to the original in Ft Lauderdale years ago- Great and easy service and you design your sub the way you like it. Always everything is freshly made-

data.title: F$&Kin Amazing
data.text:
Defiantly hit the Pregnancy Craving!thank you !!!  
One word amazing like always ! 
Amazing Staff .
Clean def could eat off there floors . 
Definitely better then the Ft.Lauderdale location .  
Will return .

data.title: Monster Sub
data.text: I've been going to Laspadas now for years. Everytime im there i have to get a monster Sub. It's the best sub you will ever have in your life.

data.title: So Good!
data.text: Was telling someone the other day how you can't get good subs down here, they told me to try Laspada's. I got a turkey and salami sub, I'm telling you it might be the best sub I've ever had. Awesome.
